00055 
00056 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00057 #include <config.h>
00058 #include <stdio.h>
00059 #include <stdarg.h>
00060 #include <stdlib.h>
00061 #include <library/i_error.h>
00062 #include "i_types.h"
00063 
00064 /* This is a function call version of ITicast (i_types.h).  It is useful
00065    for setting a debugger breakpoint at the punt line.  MCM 7/2000 */
00066 ITint32 ITicast_fn (ITintmax v)
00067 {
00068   ITintmax w = (ITintmax) (ITint32) (v);
00069   if (v == w)
00070     return (ITint32) (v);
00071   else
00072     {
00073       IT_punt (__FILE__ ": %d MCM_ITicast with value %llx", __LINE__, v);
00074       return ((ITint32) 0);
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 int
00079 IT_typecheck (void)
00080 {
00081   int sz;
00082 
00083 #define IT_TYPECK(type, tname, size)   if ((sz = sizeof(type)) != size) \
00084     I_punt("IT_typecheck: %s is %d bytes instead of %d", tname, sz, size);
00085 
00086   IT_TYPECK (ITint8, "ITint8", 1);
00087   IT_TYPECK (ITuint8, "ITuint8", 1);
00088   IT_TYPECK (ITint16, "ITint16", 2);
00089   IT_TYPECK (ITuint16, "ITuint16", 2);
00090   IT_TYPECK (ITint32, "ITint32", 4);
00091   IT_TYPECK (ITuint32, "ITuint32", 4);
00092 
00093 #ifdef IT64BIT
00094   IT_TYPECK (ITint64, "ITint64", 8);
00095   IT_TYPECK (ITuint64, "ITuint64", 8);
00096 #endif
00097 
00098   return 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 int
00102 IT_punt (char *fmt, ...)
00103 {
00104   va_list args;
00105 
00106   fprintf (stderr, "ITicast assertion failed at ");
00107   va_start (args, fmt);
00108   vfprintf (stderr, fmt, args);
00109   va_end (args);
00110   fprintf (stderr, "\n");
00111   exit (-1);
00112   return 0;
00113 }
